product_name: The Roadside Mountain Bike Maintenance Manual
long_description: A handy, lay-flat guide that covers everything from flats to tool-selection,. Author: Guy Andrews. Softcover; 128 pages; color photographs. Bloomsbury Publishing LLC; copyright 2014. Includes tips on fixing a flat, repairing a chain, straightening a rim, adjusting and replacing cables, and lubing cables, chains and cassettes; choosing and packing tools. Includes a section on administering emergency procedures and first aid. Measures approximately 8 x 5.5 in. with a tough cover so you can bring it with you.
short_description: A handy, lay-flat guide that covers everything from flats to tool-selection, The Roadside Mountain Bike Maintenance Manual offers quick fixes to keep you and your bike on the trail.
